title: Algiers (Mystery, 1938) with Charles Boyer & Hedy Lamarr | Movie

sources.title: Algiers (Mystery, 1938) with Charles Boyer & Hedy Lamarr | Movie
sources.description:
You've got a date with danger, a Rendezvous with romance in the glamorous, mysterious Algiers.
A wanted jewel thief ensconced in the Casbah meets a beautiful woman who makes him long for an escape.

Original title: Algiers

Colorized version https://youtu.be/iXEI8AiyhSA

This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Director : John Cromwell
Writers : John Howard Lawson, James M. Cain, Henri La Barthe
Stars: Charles Boyer, Hedy Lamarr, Sigrid Gurie
Genres: Drama, Mystery, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:34 Intriguing story of a notorious criminal hiding in Casbah, evading capture in Algiers.
06:36 Intrigue unfolds as Pepe eludes the police and Regis seeks revenge in Algiers.
12:34 Intriguing plot unfolds as characters navigate through a tense situation, with unexpected twists and turns.
22:56 Intrigue and deception unfold in Algiers as characters plot to capture Pepe, with discussions of his potential demise and a plan to lure him out of hiding.
28:21 Mysterious letter leads to suspicion and intrigue in Algiers.
34:08 Emotional turmoil and longing for escape in Casbah, leading to a desire for freedom and a new life in Paris.
39:49 Intrigue and suspense unfold as characters discuss Pierrot's whereabouts and their concerns for him.
46:53 Romantic encounter in Paris leads to reminiscing about childhood and future plans.
56:26 Tragic love story unfolds in the streets of Casbah, involving Pepe, Ines, and Pierrot.
1:07:17 Romantic mystery unfolds in Algiers as characters express love, longing, and escape in Paris.
1:19:34 Romantic drama unfolds in Algiers as Pepe le Moko faces a tragic fate, leading to emotional turmoil and a desperate letter delivery.
1:25:49 Intrigue, deception, and a secret meeting unfold as Pepe receives shocking news about the arrest of Carlos and a mysterious letter from Gaby.
1:28:40 Intrigue, deception, and love unfold in a dramatic encounter between Pepe and Gaby on a ship.
